name: TestScriptProfileDestinationType
title: Test script profile destination type
description: This value set defines a set of codes that are used to indicate the profile type of a test system when acting as the destination within a TestScript.

concept.definition: General FHIR server used to respond to operations sent from a FHIR client.
A FHIR server acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Manager.
A FHIR server acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Processor.
A FHIR server acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Receiver.
